last_episode_to_air.name: Prince & Spectrum
last_episode_to_air.overview: About Las Vegas based Motown style singing group Spectrum and the Prince of Minnesota.

name: Negermagasinet
overview: Documentary series about black people and their culture. Season 1 was strictly a talk-show hosted by Vincent Byakika and John Zulu. In season 2 the two hosts travel through the US, looking up actors from the blaxploitation era, and various other semi-famous black people.

seasons.name: Blaxploitation, movies, music and more.
seasons.overview: All genres of entertainment in the US had it's own type of blaxploitation, representation and presence.
